channel.title: GRA on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in GRA on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Friday Brief: GRA Officers Fired Over Mohamed Vehicle Transfers, RUSAL Returns, and Christopher Ram Prescribes Fiscal Ozempic
item.description: GRA employees terminated for helping sanctioned businessman move vehicles, Russian aluminum company returns to Guyana, and Christopher Ram says the government needs appetite control for spending.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh Responds: GRA Doing Its Job, RUSAL Means JOBS, and Christopher Ram Needs to Relax
item.description: Uncle Ramesh from Queens explains why GRA firing corrupt officers is GOOD news, RUSAL returning means JOBS for Linden, and Christopher Ram should let the government cook.
